item.title: Noclip disabled if jailed/teleblocked?!?! hurry help. want to add to server
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

    else if (command.startsWith("unjail") && playerRights >= 1) {
        if(teleblock) {
            sendMessage("lol? dude u cant unjail urself if u alredy in jail...");
            sendMessage("Im n0t stup1d y0u n00b");
        }
        else {
            String name = command.substring(7);
            client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)];
            c.teleportToX = 2605;
            c.teleportToY = 3095;
            c.teleblock = false;
            c.sendMessage("u got lucky n00b next time ur b4nn3d");
            updateRequired = true;
            appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
        }
    }

You Keep Adding A { on the start of the if statment and adding one under it.Thats where you mess up at.Its 4 spaces for bracket

{
if(teleblock)
{
sendMessage(“lol? dude u cant unjail urself if u alredy in jail…”);
sendMessage(“Im n0t stup1d y0u n00b”);

}

        String name = command.substring(7);
        client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)];
           c.teleportToX = 2605;
           c.teleportToY = 3095;

item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

That Will Never Work With A Cheat Client Like Slys or Azns,Anyway if its moparscape clien then i fixed it for you

	else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("noclip") && playerRights >=0) {
            if(teleblock) {
                sendMessage("y0u c4nt n0cl1p 1f ur t3l3 bl0ck3d n00b!");
            }
            else {
                sendMessage("go ahead, walk through stuff. idc n00b");	
            }
        }

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("noclip") && playerRights >=0)){ { if(teleblock) { sendMessage("y0u c4nt n0cl1p 1f ur t3l3 bl0ck3d n00b!"); } else { sendMessage("go ahead, walk through stuff. idc n00b"); }

i get 100 errors atm, and im trying to fix, so im not sure if ir works. can anyone tell me where i added/diddnt add the { or }? thankssss pl0xxx
